snippet.title: How 2 Escape - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
2 roles. 1 Way to Exit.
--
How 2 Escape is an escape-simulation game where two players will need to cooperate on asymmetrical gameplay and devices!

Wishlist the game with your best friend now:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2264140/How_2_Escape/

Join our Discord : https://discord.gg/ZsG9vCuXAq

Follow us and don't miss any news from our games:
https://twitter.com/JustForGames
https://www.instagram.com/justforgames/
https://www.tiktok.com/@justforgames_
